document.full_text: a would-be groom and several relatives going to a wedding were among the 28 people killed when a wooden bridge collapsed and sent a bus crashing into a lake in india's remote northeast, officials said tuesday.
document.title: groom among 28 dead in india wedding party crash
lines_and_colors: a would-be groom and several relatives going to a wedding were among the 28 people killed when a wooden bridge collapsed and sent a bus crashing into a lake in india's remote northeast, officials said tuesday.
